content:
From: 游珍 <yucy0405@163.com>
I don't know how to transform a file(.thy) to a file(.pdf) in Isabelle? I did it at one time, but now forget.
I need you help.Thanks!
yucy

From: Makarius <makarius@sketis.net>
You probably mean the 'display_drafts' command -- there is also a menu
item for the same in Proof General.

Makarius
